item.title: Trump criticises 'weak' European leaders over Ukraine and immigration
item.description: In his latest public criticism of Europe, the US president claims countries are "decaying".

item.title: French feminists outraged by Brigitte Macron's comment about activists
item.description: There has been pushback to the term used by France's first lady to describe activists who interrupted comedian Ary Abittan's show.

item.title: Sacked agents sue FBI, saying they were punished for taking the knee
item.description: The group say adopting a gesture used by protesters helped to defuse tensions during a 2020 demonstration.

item.title: A coup too far: Why Benin's rebel soldiers failed where others in the region succeeded
item.description: Plotters misjudged the national mood and Benin's neighbours learnt from past errors, says analyst Paul Melly.

item.title: CCTV shows suspects make off on foot with stolen artworks
item.description: Brazilian officials say thieves held up a security guard and an elderly couple before making off with the artworks on foot in SÃ£o Paulo.
